						                    Newly Diagnosed Childhood Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (Very High Risk)
						                    The treatment of very highrisk childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) during the remission induction, consolidation /intensification, and maintenance phases always includes combination chemotherapy. Children in the very highrisk ALL group are given more anticancer drugs than children
